videos.description: Julius Randle drives baseline and is unstopped on the way for the one-handed dunk.

videos.headline: Randle throws down one-handed slam

videos.description: Chris Duarte hits a 3-pointer from way downtown as the buzzer sounds to end the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chris Duarte drains near-logo 3 to end the 1st quarter) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chris Duarte drains near-logo 3 to end the 1st quarter

videos.description: Julius Randle goes hard to the rim and throws down on Malcolm Brogdon.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Randle won’t be denied at the rim for the jam) 2021/11/03 ESHEET

videos.headline: Randle won't be denied at the rim for the jam

videos.description: RJ Barrett brings the Knicks closer with a quick move to the basket for two.

videos.headline: Barrett with sweet move to the hoop
